name: Pet of the Week – Babe
description: This week's Pet of the Week is Babe the guinea pig from our Bonita shelter! Babe is a little shy around his human friends at first, but a handful of grains will get him to warm up to you very quickly. He likes to have his own space and enjoys having festive blankets to cuddle up in.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week’s Pet of the Week is Babe the guinea pig from our Bonita shelter! Babe is a little shy around his human friends at first, but a handful of grains will get him to warm up to you very quickly. He likes to have his own space and enjoys having festive blankets to cuddle up in. If you’re interested in adopting Babe or any guinea pigs like him, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
